articles.author: Phil Plait
articles.title: JWST update: All 18 eyes of the telescope now see a single, focused image! Kinda! - Syfy
articles.description: After a series of important steps for the James Webb Space Telescope that have gone really well, there’s even more great JWST news: The 18 small mirrors have gone through their initial alignment and focus, and can now produce a single image of a star!

articles.title: Asteroid four times as big as the Shard set to cross paths with Earth - Metro.co.uk
